title: Add Class
brief: Create a class with any label that suits any feature of your students , grade , timing or simply Brilliant

title: Add Students
brief: Add students to your classes to assign exams to all at once and view their class-based reports.

title: Author Questions
brief: Start building your item (question) bank in either MCQ, Short Answer or T/F to be used for future exams.

title: Adjust Grade/Questions
brief: You can adjust the marks and duration allocated to each question in your personal bank.

title: Plan & Launch Exams
brief: Search your item bank to plan exams and launch them to assigned classes.

title: Generate Reports
brief: Generate reports per student or per class and decide when to share results with them.

title: Elegant Design
brief: Designers applied the best practices in UX (User Experience) and UI (User Interface)

title: Top-Notch Technology
brief: The module was developed using Python which enables analytics using AI (artificial intelligence)

title: Secured Question Bank
brief: All your questions and results are secured in a cloud and can be restored, if lost.
